message: Hello Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product which we believe would greatly benefit your business. Given its value to you, I propose an initial price of $950000.
Alice, thanks for the offer. While I see the value in your product, $950000 is a bit steep for my budget. I'm willing to pay $850000 for it, which would still be a great deal for both of us.
Thank you for your response, Bob. I appreciate your willingness to meet our valuation. In light of this, I would like to counter with an offer of $900000 for the product.
Alice, I understand your position, but $900000 is still a bit too high for me.  I'm willing to go to $875000.  This is a fair price that allows us both to benefit from this deal.
Considering your latest offer, Alice proposes a counteroffer of $890000 for the product. We aim to find a mutually beneficial solution while respecting the value you place on it.
